actionConfiguration.body:
select cdm.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_name,b3.section_id ,b3.theory_percentage_completed,b3.theory_updated_time ,b3.test_updated_time  from(
	select b1.section_id, b1.chapter_tag,b1.theory_percentage_completed,b1.theory_updated_time ,b2.test_updated_time from(
		with total_theory_data as (select chapter_tag,count(*) as total_thoey_concepts from public.topic_detail_master 
group by chapter_tag
order by chapter_tag asc) 


select tcd.section_id,tcd.chapter_tag,theory_completed*100/total_thoey_concepts as theory_percentage_completed , theory_updated_time from (SELECT  section_id, chapter_tag ,
		max(updated_at) theory_updated_time,count(*) as theory_completed FROM public.course_theory_track ctt
group by section_id, chapter_tag
order by section_id ,chapter_tag asc )tcd
 join total_theory_data ttd on tcd.chapter_tag = ttd.chapter_tag
 order by tcd.section_id,tcd.chapter_tag asc) b1
 
 join (select section_id,chapter_tag,max(updated_at) as test_updated_time from public.course_test_track
	  group by section_id,chapter_tag
	  order by chapter_tag asc)b2
	  
 on b1.chapter_tag = b2.chapter_tag and
 b1.section_id = b2.section_id) b3 right join public.chapter_details_master cdm
 on b3.chapter_tag =cdm.chapter_tag 


where cdm.publication_id = (select publication_id from public.school_academy
 where class_id = {{std.selectedOptionValue}} and subject_id = {{subject.selectedOptionValue}} ) and
cdm.subject_id = {{subject.selectedOptionValue}}  and cdm.std = {{std.selectedOptionLabel}}
group by cdm.chapter_tag,b3.section_id ,b3.theory_percentage_completed,b3.theory_updated_time ,b3.test_updated_time
order by cdm.chapter_tag asc
